61.eng-name: Virtues and Merits of the Prophet (pbuh) and his Companions

hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah bin Malik bin Buhaina Al-Asdi:When the Prophet (ﷺ) prostrated, he used to keep his arms so widely apart that we used to see his armpits. (The sub-narrator, Ibn Bukair said, "The whiteness of his armpits)

chapter.ara-name: باب صِفَةِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم
